attributes.action: Stop the jab for pregnant mothers
attributes.additional_details: Under government own guidelines this is not safe
attributes.background: Stop the Covid 19 vaccinations for pregnant Mothers

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
 
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Covid-19 vaccinations are already optional for pregnant women. 

Government guidelines do not state that the vaccine is unsafe for pregnant women. You can see the guidance here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-vaccination-women-of-childbearing-age-currently-pregnant-planning-a-pregnancy-or-breastfeeding/covid-19-vaccination-a-guide-for-women-of-childbearing-age-pregnant-planning-a-pregnancy-or-breastfeeding
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
